task.title: Manage a dynamic task list.
task.description: Add, view, and remove tasks effortlessly. Use the class methods addTask and removeTask to manage your task list dynamically and display the results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Explore our FAQs to learn more about how our platform works, its features, and how it can help you build and manage content with ease.

items.title: What is Vanilla CMS?
items.body: Vanilla CMS is a powerful Headless CMS designed to help developers and content teams manage and deliver content seamlessly across multiple platforms. It provides a flexible API-based approach for ultimate customization.

items.title: What types of projects is Vanilla CMS best suited for?
items.body: Vanilla CMS is ideal for websites, mobile apps, e-commerce platforms, SaaS applications, and any digital product that requires a structured and scalable content management solution.

items.title: Can I integrate Vanilla CMS with my existing tech stack?
items.body: Absolutely! Vanilla CMS is API-first, making it compatible with React, Vue, Next.js, Nuxt.js, Svelte, Flutter, and more. You can fetch content via REST or GraphQL APIs.

items.title: How is Vanilla CMS different from traditional CMS platforms?
items.body: Unlike traditional CMSs, Vanilla CMS decouples the backend from the frontend, giving developers the freedom to use any technology to display content. This makes it more scalable, faster, and adaptable for modern applications.

items.title: Does Vanilla CMS support multiple users and roles?
items.body: Yes! Vanilla CMS comes with Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), allowing you to define permissions for different team members, ensuring security and content integrity.

items.title: Is Vanilla CMS scalable for large enterprises?
items.body: Yes! Our architecture is cloud-based and built for scalability, ensuring your content performs well whether you're a startup or a large enterprise with high traffic demands.
